name: Jammy Dreams
description:
I made Jammy Dreams for LSDJam 2021. The game is a sort of virtual dream journal.

The game features warping textures and some unsettling moments (Scary things chasing/following you through some of the dreams, spooky ambience.)

Controls - WSAD to Move, Mouse to look, Spacebar to hop.

Esc to pause.

I want to update this game with a few extra dreams and some more features as time allows.

Please check out my other games, they should be a bit more polished!
